summary: Upon entering his fiancée's family mansion, a man discovers a savage family curse and fears that his future brother-in-law has entombed his bride-to-be prematurely.
cast: Vincent Price|Mark Damon|Myrna Fahey|Harry Ellerbe|David Andar|Mario Bellini|Bill Borzage|Eleanor LeFaber|Nadajan|Ruth Oklander|George Paul|Géraldine Paulette|Phil Sulvestre|John Zimeas
keywords: gothic horror|19th century|national film registry|psychotronic film|curse
title: La caída de la casa Usher
